execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the EU sales database (email, full name and id) and mark them as region = 'EU'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT email, full_name, id AS customer_id, 'EU' AS region FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the US sales database (email, full name and id) and mark them as region = 'US'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT email, full_name, id AS customer_id, 'US' AS region FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
